name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 12, Xi'an, Shaanxi. Zhongcheng Excellence Road and Bridge Engineering Co., Ltd. was forcibly demolished without any resettlement compensation. During the demolition, a worker rushed to the leader and knelt down, and was then carried away by security guards. The company said that due to the difficulties in operation due to the epidemic, it was unable to pay for the relocation expenses, and hoped that the relevant units could pay for the company's relocation expenses.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 12, Nehe, Heilongjiang. Tianjin Siji Environmental Protection Nehe Branch has been in arrears of wages for sanitation workers and drivers for three months. Workers went on strike and went to the local petition office to demand their wages. A company official said that wages will be paid to employees between the 15th and 16th, but employees are required to delete the videos posted on Douyin and Kuaishou.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 12, in Dalian, Liaoning, employees of Dalian Zhaohai Seafood Co., Ltd. went on strike to protect their rights, with a large number of security guards on site to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 11, Nangong City, Hebei Province. Land Courtyard has been unfinished for six years and the owners came to the city government to defend their rights and demanded to see the mayor. But the government has kept the door closed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 2-10, Qingdao, Shandong. The Heda Xingfucheng real estate project has been unfinished for more than a year, and the owners gathered at the construction site to defend their rights. During the period, the owners questioned the police who were maintaining stability: What is the purpose of the Communist Party? Is this how the Communist Party serves the people? Another owner said that the police kept calling and threatening him to delete the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 11, Liaoning. The Tieneng Construction Company owed workers machinery and labor fees, and the workers held banners outside the company to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 12th, near Shenzhen Kaisa City Plaza, Kaisa property owners defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 10, a blogger filmed the current situation of "Shangxiajiu", the most famous pedestrian street in Guangzhou. In the video, many shops along the street have closed down, and the street is deserted. The blogger said that it was hard to find a shop here before. In the 2000s, the rent of shops here was as high as 100,000 yuan a month.
Through searching, it was found that reports and videos about the closure of shops in Shangxiajiu began to appear in May 2022.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 12, Linxia Hui Autonomous Prefecture, Gansu Province, China reported that due to the public opinion monitoring of the Education Bureau, local junior high school students were preparing to support Palestine at the graduation ceremony, which led to local middle schools launching emergency responses, requiring all students to disband their self-built WeChat groups, prohibiting the bringing of mobile phones, flags, banners and slogans into the campus, or postponing the shooting of graduation photos, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A local school notified that all classes were required to disband private group chats among students, and any student who participated in "special Internet rectification activities" would have their graduation certificates delayed or not issued.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 13, Guangzhou, Guangdong. A large truck suddenly rushed into the traffic waiting for the red light at the intersection, hitting more than ten vehicles in a row, some of which were seriously damaged, and the scene was in a mess.
The official report said that the driver had been controlled and the cause of the accident was under further investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 12, Guangzhou, Guangdong. An old lady in Zhujiang Jiayuan Community piled up waste paper in the passageway and was cleared by the property management.
Afterwards, the old lady came forward with a machete to argue with the property management and tried to stab the other party, but the machete was taken away by the property management.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Although Chinese students are strictly prevented from expressing support for Palestine across the country, the Communist Party of China has expressed support for Palestine many times in its history. Xi Jinping himself has also expressed support for Palestine.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 12, Lee Jang-soo, the former Korean head coach of Beijing Guoan Football Club, posted a message saying that due to a debt dispute between the Guoan Club and Zhonghe Real Estate, the court is now going to forcibly auction his house. He hopes that the Beijing High Court will investigate the matter and return his house to him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Previously, a student called on classmates in a WeChat group to support Palestine at the graduation ceremony.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 12, a child murder case occurred in Mayang Miao Autonomous County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province.
The police issued a reward notice at that time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Hengshui prisonization
Netizens submitted a record of penalty points for Hengshui No. 2 Middle School: points will be deducted for holding a book incorrectly, going to the toilet at night, sleeping in an incorrect position, or even laughing or combing hair.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 13, Guangxi. A man riding an electric bike was suspected of violating the rules and was checked by traffic police. During the process, the police sprayed pepper spray on the man who was already slumped on the ground, sparking controversy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 12, in Impression Garden Community, Kunshan, Jiangsu, the property management announced that it would increase parking fees, which caused dissatisfaction among the owners. On that day, the owners protested at the gate of the community, and a large number of special police were present to maintain stability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 13, Yangjiang, Guangdong. A large number of urban management officers hung banners at the entrance of their units to defend their rights, suspected of being due to staffing issues.
Netizens joked, "Why don't they take legal action to defend their rights? They should believe that the law will help them."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/RY4yLsasQw

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of June 13, the Qingdao Intermediate People's Court of Shandong Province publicly pronounced the first-instance verdict on the "boy beaten to death by martial arts coach case". On that day, many citizens accompanied the victim's family outside the court to wait for the verdict.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 11, a video clip in which Liu Junchuan, former deputy director of the Taiwan Affairs Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and the State Council, said that after reunification, Taiwan's fiscal revenue could be used to improve people's livelihood was immediately ridiculed by netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the Baoshan District of Shanghai, the owners of Park Hyatt Riverside, Country Garden, collectively read Xi Jinping's quotations to protect their rights at the Baoshan District Petition Bureau because the houses delivered had serious quality problems and the goods were not as advertised.
According to the contributor, due to the recent introduction of the "guaranteed delivery of houses" policy, no one in the domestic news media is willing to report such situations, so the owners can only choose to go to the Petition Bureau to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Xiaomi has recently tightened the installation of apps from unknown sources

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Strengthening patriotism education in primary school mathematics
From June 11 to 14, the editorial department of "China Basic Education" of the Chinese Society of Education held a seminar in Hai'an City, Jiangsu Province. In-depth discussion of the practical path to strengthen patriotism education in primary school mathematics subjects, and in-depth implementation of mathematics curriculum ideological and political education.
In December 2023, the Ministry of Education emphasized that patriotism education content should be integrated into various subjects and textbooks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a 17-year-old girl from Huai'an, Jiangsu Province received good news. She entered the finals of the mathematics competition with a global ranking of 12th, becoming the first secondary school student to enter the finals in the history of the competition. The list of finalists released by the organizing committee shows that most of the 801 contestants who advanced this time are from famous universities such as Tsinghua University, Peking University, MIT, and Cambridge.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 13, in Panjin, Liaoning, it was reported online that retired employees of local institutions could receive heating allowances, but employees of enterprises could not. On that day, a large number of retired elderly people went to the Panjin City Petition Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: User contributions

content: Today's Idiom Full Text

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 13, Nanchang, Jiangxi. The Affiliated Middle School of Nanchang Normal University owed teachers wages and social security, and teachers held up banners on campus to protest their rights and demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 12, Ordos, Inner Mongolia. The Xinqidianjiayuan real estate project has been unfinished for 13 years and has not yet been delivered. The owners jumped off the building to defend their rights, and some owners were taken away by the police.
